hero.title: Kanishk
hero.description: I design and own frontend systems that scale across teams and products, focusing on performance, reliability, and maintainable architecture. My work bridges product goals with engineering decisions to deliver consistent, high-quality user experiences

items.title: Expensio
items.description: Expensio is a comprehensive expense tracking platform designed to streamline financial management. The website featured intuitive interfaces for logging expenses, categorizing transactions, and generating instant, detailed reports. Users could effortlessly monitor their spending patterns, set budgets, and gain insights through real-time analytics.

items.title: ESG Reporting
items.description: ESG Reporting is a platform designed to help companies manage and report on their environmental, social, and governance (ESG) performance. The website featured intuitive interfaces for logging expenses, categorizing transactions, and generating instant, detailed reports. Users could effortlessly monitor their spending patterns, set budgets, and gain insights through real-time analytics.

items.title: Dynamic Forms & Grid
items.description: Developed internal tools like customizable grid and form components, empowering streamlined data management and user interaction. These tools offer flexibility and efficiency, enhancing operational workflows with tailored solutions for diverse organizational needs.

items.title: Weather Forecast
items.description: Experience real-time weather updates with our innovative app. Track temperature, humidity, and forecasts seamlessly tailored to your location. Stay ahead with reliable insights, ensuring you're prepared for any weather conditions.

items.desc: Leading the modernization of a large-scale web platform, enabling faster feature delivery, better cross-team collaboration, and improved long-term reliability. Mentoring junior developers.
Built high-impact frontend systems powering enterprise analytics and AI workflows, translating complex backend capabilities into intuitive, high-performance user experiences.

about.description: I’m a senior frontend engineer who owns frontend systems end-to-end, from architectural decisions to production impact. I focus on building scalable, performant platforms and helping teams ship with confidence through clear standards, thoughtful trade-offs, and long-term thinking.
